title: Grandmother foils alleged school shooting plot
text:
Grandmother foils alleged school shooting plot Thursday, February 15, 2018 - 01:17 
Bail has been set at $5 million for an 18-year-old student suspected of planning a shooting at his high school. His grandmother has been credited with foiling his alleged plot. Linda So reports.
